author: chirino
msg: The file lock implementation on some JVM/OS combinations is broken.  See:
If -Djava.nio.channels.FileLock.broken=true is now passed as an argument to the JVM, the actveio journal will avoid using that file locking APIs.

author: jheymans
msg: fixing module location vs artifactid for continuum

author: rpluem
msg: * Prevent r->parsed_uri.path from being NULL as this can cause segmentation
faults e.g. in mod_cache. Set it to "/" in this case.
